message.content: Initial Alert update with basic email details

resource.name: Suspicious Email:{{vars.source_data.headers.subject}}

params.body:
Your email with Subject: ||{{vars.source_data.headers.subject}}|| has been received,
you shall receive the investigation results as soon as available.

SoC Team
params.subject: Suspicious Email received for investigation

params.body:
{{vars.email_from}} is suspected to send malicious emails, it will be blocked until the investigation is over

SoC Team
params.subject: SOC Notification: email from: {{vars.email_from}}. Blocked Temporarily

message.content: Inform all recipients the offender email sender is blocked

params.body:
{{vars.email_from}} is suspected to send malicious emails, it will be blocked until the investigation is over

SoC Team
params.subject: SOC Notification: {{vars.email_sender}} Blocked Temporarily

message.content: Create EIS Task: review {{vars.email_sender}} related alerts

resource.name: Review Blocked Emails
resource.taskdata:
Emails: {{vars.original_email_sender}} has been blocked on FortiGate,
review the action and unblock it if required:
1. Open any Alert
2. Click Action
3. Select FortiMail
4. Select Unblock Email action
5. set the email to: {{vars.original_email_sender}}
6. Click Execute
resource.description:
Emails: {{vars.original_email_sender}} has been blocked on FortiGate,
review the action and unblock it if required:
1. Open any Alert
2. Click Action
3. Select FortiMail
4. Select Unblock Email action
5. set the email to: {{vars.original_email_sender}}
6. Click Execute

steps.name: Original Email Attached
steps.description: Check Whether the email is forwarded inline or as an attachment

message.content: Submitted Email was forwarded as an Attachment

params.python_function:
import base64
file="{{vars.file_attachements.0.file}}"
filename="{{vars.file_attachements.0.metadata.filename}}"
try:
	with open('/tmp/'+filename, 'wb') as tmp_file:
		tmp_file.write(base64.b64decode(file))
except:
	print('Generic: Could not write attachment!')

message.content: Upload Attached Files to FortiSOAR and save them as indicators

arguments.operationTitle: File: Upload a file to CyOPs and Create an Attachment

routes.name: Prepare File Attachments -> Record File Attachment
Upload File IOCs -> Create Indicators
Record File Attachment -> Upload File IOCs
Create Attached Email -> Parse Attached Email Attributes
Parse Attached Email Attributes -> Prepare File Attachments
Create Inline Email -> Parse Inline Email Attributes
Parse Inline Email Attributes -> Prepare File Attachments
Create File Indicators -> Extract Indicators
Extract Indicators -> Copy  of Whitelist local attributes
Local Attributes -> Update Alert
Update Alert -> Original Email Attached
Original Email Attached -> Create Inline Email
routes.label: no

routes.name: Original Email Attached -> Copy  of Create Inline Email
routes.label: yes

routes.name: Start -> Set Source Data
Send Auto_Reply to Sender -> Send Auto_Reply to Other Recipients
Send Auto_Reply to Other Recipients -> Block Email Sender
Block Email Sender -> Copy  of Send Auto_Reply to Other Recipients
EIS Notification Email -> Review Blocked Emails
Whitelist local attributes -> Find IP Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Find URL Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Find Host Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Find Email Indicators
Create IP Indicator -> Link Indicators
Process IP Indicators -> Set IP Lists
Set IP Lists -> Create IP Indicator
Find IP Indicators -> Flatten IP lists
Flatten IP lists -> Process IP Indicators
Find URL Indicators -> Copy  of Flatten IP lists
Find Host Indicators -> Copy  of Copy  of Flatten IP lists
Find Email Indicators -> Copy 1 of Copy  of Flatten IP lists
Flatten URL lists -> Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators
Flatten Host lists -> Copy  of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators
Flatten Email lists -> Copy 1 of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators
Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators -> Copy  of Set IP Lists
Copy  of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators -> Copy  of Copy  of Set IP Lists
Copy 1 of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators -> Copy 1 of Copy  of Set IP Lists
Set URL Lists -> Wait for URLs
Set Host Lists -> Wait for Hosts
Set Email Lists -> Wait for Emails
Wait for URLs -> Create URL Indicator
Create URL Indicator -> Link URL Indicators
Wait for Hosts -> Copy  of Copy  of Create IP Indicator
Copy  of Copy  of Create IP Indicator -> Copy  of Copy  of Link Indicators
Wait for Emails -> Copy 1 of Create IP Indicator
Copy 1 of Create IP Indicator -> Copy 1 of Link Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Send Auto_Reply to Sender
